reviewText: I didn't know about this program when it was released.  I only learned about it this year.  I am very pleased to have found this in DVD form.  It is enthralling for the 4 to six year old children who view it.  There are good discussion points in it.
Bought this for my daughter who watched it when she was little. She wanted it for the little one who lives with her. Needless to say she was impressed!
Purchased for my children.  It presents a horrific subject in a way that is not scary to children but informs them of strategies to ensure their safety.
